role.argrole: entity arg0 bumps into and damages

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VC 是) (VP (VV 想到) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (LCP-TMP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PP-LOC (P 在) (NP (NN 博物馆))) (VP (VV 搬来搬去)))) (LC 时)) (VP (VV 可能) (VP (VV 会) (VP (VV 撞坏))))))))))
example.arg: *PRO* 在 博物馆 搬来搬去 时
